item.title: Welcome!
item.author: Author
item.description: Welcome to my new blogging site - joshops.co.uk. Iâ€™ll be blogging all about Azure, PowerShell, a bit of C#, and anything else I find interesting along the way. Follow me on [Twitter(https://twitter.com/JoshWild18)] to keep up to date with all new posts. The aim is to have at least 1 post per week, but life may get in the way of that!
